EmailTemplate.name: Malta SOC User with ADFS Access Deactivation
EmailTemplate.subject: Malta SOC User {!Target_User.FirstName} {!Target_User.LastName} with ADFS Access deactivated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
The user {!Target_User.FirstName} {!Target_User.LastName} with HCM Login Id {!Target_User.HCM_Login_ID__c} has been deactivated from the system.
Thanks, Salesforce Admin
